articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Saudi Pro League kicks off after raiding Europe’s top football clubs - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Saudi Pro League spent nearly half a billion dollars luring top players, coaches from traditional European powerhouses.
articles.content: The Saudi Pro League kicks off on Friday following a year of high-profile transfers and amid criticism that Saudi Arabias lavish spending amounts to an attempt to shift the focus from its dire human … [+3780 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Gorrie
articles.title: Man City XI vs Burnley: Gvardiol debut; team news and predicted lineup - Evening Standard
articles.description: Manchester City are set to hand new signing Josko Gvardiol a debut against Burnley in tonight’s Premier League opener.
articles.content: The Croatian international defender joined the club from RB Leipzig in a £77.6million deal last week but was not involved during Sundays Community Shield penalty shootout loss to Arsenal at Wembley.… [+986 chars]
